title.narrative: Strengthening the Capacity of Regional Financial Institutions in the CEMAC Region

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to strengthen the capacity of selected CEMAC regional financial institutions to implement their mandates in the areas of financial stability, inclusion and integrity.

Commission Bancaire de l'Afrique Centrale - COBAC
Groupe d' Action contre le Blanchiment d' Argent en Afrique Centrale (GABAC)

condition.narrative: A mid-term review of the project will be carried out 24 months after credit effectiveness and annual reviews will be conducted inthe first quarter of the year.

BEAC shall no later than two months from the Effectiveness Deadline, prepare and submit an official correspondence explaining thatthe activities of the PIU will be subject to internal audit of BEAC every six months.

BEAC shall within two months of Project effectiveness, through the PIU recruit and thereafter maintaining all throughout theimplementation of the Project, a financial management specialist and a monitoring and evaluation expert. A decentralized projectofficer shall be recruited based on project needs.
BEAC will prepare and send to the WBG no later than November 30 of each year, the annual work plan, procurement plan, and budget ofthe project.
In the event of any conflict between the provisions of the Project Operations Manual and those of the Financing Agreement, theprovisions of the Financing Agreement shall prevail.

The Recipient shall not later than two months from the Effective Date, prepare and adopt a Project Operational Manual satisfactoryto the Association and carry out the Project in accordance with the Project Operations Manual. Except as the Association shallotherwise agree in writing, the Recipient shall not assign, amend, abrogate the Project Operations Manual, or any provisionthereof.

title.narrative: Increased capacity of BEAC to produce reliable financial, monetary and economic statistics on a monthly basis.

target.value: Data updated and published every month

title.narrative: Number of Mutual Evaluations carried out in CEMAC member countries using the revised FATF methodology
Number of staff trained to carry out mutual evaluations by year 2
The Composite Index of Economic Activity is computed based on data from 6 countries and published on a quarterly basis.

target.value: CIEA is compiled with data from 6 countries and published on a quarterly basis

title.narrative: Financial inclusion indicators produced and published by year 3
Regional financial inclusion task force created by year 2
Updated regulations for issuing and processing emoney by year 2
Increased capacity of GABAC to comply with the FATF membership requirements.
Assess MFIs financial conditions under the new risk based framework
Increased capacity of COBAC to supervise banks under new risk based supervision framework.
Increased capacity of BEAC to expand the female population's coverage of the regional credit registry.
Increased capacity of BEAC to expand the population coverage of the regional credit registry.
Conduct at least 2 innovative pilots in selected economies
Percentage of women amongst the new financial services users reached through innovative pilots in selected countries
Adoption of an operations manual outlining FOGADAC's key responsibilities, procedures and relevant documentation for the rapid an effective resolution of a failing bank by year 3
Develop methodologies, procedures and systems to conduct risk based supervision by year 2
Implement risk based supervision for MFIs by Year 3
Migrate MFI data from SESAME to CERBER system by year 2
Produce reports and dashboards with KPI on MFI performance by year 3
BEAC to prepare financial statements in compliance with IFRS standards by year 2
Private credit bureau operator selected by year 4
Adopt credit bureau law by year 2
